title: Deceased adopted out
parentQuestion: Did you legally adopt {deceasedName} out of your family (give them up for adoption)?
siblingQuestion: Did {deceased name}’s parents legally adopt them out of their family (give them up for adoption)?

deceasedAdoptedOut.requiredParent: Select ‘Yes’ if you gave {deceasedName} up for adoption
deceasedAdoptedOut.requiredSibling: Select ‘Yes’ if {deceasedName}’s parents gave them up for adoption
